card.name: Warlock SHS
card.text: When this creature dies, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Search the Forest
card.text: Attune (Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control) {G}|Search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {W}|Create a 1/1 Ally creature token that's all colors.

card.name: Corrupted Kirali
card.text: Blight {1}{W} (You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {1}{W}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Desert's Consumption

card.name: Desert's Consumption
card.text: When Desert's Consumption enters, choose a creature you control to have it enchant. Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated. --- (Front): Corrupted Kirali

card.name: Frostpath Traveler
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life and may exile a card from a graveyard. Blight {2}{WU}{WU} (You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {2}{WU}{WU}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Curse of the Frostpath

card.name: Curse of the Frostpath
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, put a stun counter on two target tapped permanents you control. You lose 2 life. --- (Front): Frostpath Traveler

card.name: Desert Commander
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Head of Recruitment

card.name: Aqiman Charger
card.text: When Aqiman Charger enters, conjure a duplicate of another target nontoken creature you control into your hand.

card.name: Crafty Escape
card.text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. If that creature was a Warrior, it also gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Shattered Swordbearer
card.text: First strike Once each turn, when a card leaves your graveyard, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Frostpath Soldier

card.name: Seek Answers

card.text: Once each turn, when one or more tokens enter under your control, draw a card. Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control attack, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 Ally creature token that's all colors.

card.name: The Icelord
card.text: Cards can't be conjured.

card.name: Wielder of Stars
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard up to three cards. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card discarded this way. When Wielder of Stars enters or attacks, acquire an instant or sorcery card. (Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an instant or sorcery card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Kanil, Night Rider of Ice
card.text: Kanil, Night Rider of Ice can't be blocked. Whenever Kanil, Night Rider of Ice deals combat damage to a player, return up to one creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Seek Prosperity
card.text: Seek Prosperity costs {2} less to cast if you've conjured a card this turn. Acquire X noncreature cards. (Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X noncreature cards. Put those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Whimsical Spellcaster
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, reveal the top card of your library. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put it into your hand.

card.name: Wizard of Aenir
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Noncreature spells you cast have attune and "{U}{U}{U}{R}{R}{R}|Draw a card."

card.name: Warlock of Shadow Sorcery
card.text: When Warlock of Shadow Sorcery dies, you draw a card and lose 1 life. Blight {B} (You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Warlock of Demonic Darkness

card.name: Warlock of Demonic Darkness
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Warlock of Demonic Darkness deals 2 damage to you. --- (Front): Warlock of Shadow Sorcery

card.name: Demonic Studies
card.text: Search your library for a Demon or Warlock card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Grand Warlock Talnir
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Warlock you control. When Grand Warlock Talnir enters, conjure three cards named Shattered Sword Warlock onto the battlefield under your control. (They're 0/1 Warlocks that cost {B} that give each other +1/+1.)

card.name: Deal With Ravens
card.text: When Deal With Ravens enters, you draw a card and lose 1 life. Whenever a creature dies, if you controlled it, target opponent loses 1 life. If you didn't, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Villainous Fiend
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures die under an opponents control for the first time each turn, you draw a card and lose 1 life. Blight {1}{B}{B}{B} (You can cast this from your graveyard transformed for {1}{B}{B}{B}. If you do, it enters under an opponent's control. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.) --- (Back): Villainy of Shadows

card.name: Villainy of Shadows
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, Villainy of Shadows deals 2 damage to you and each opponent gains 2 life. --- (Front): Villainous Fiend

card.name: Demonic Bloodlord
card.text: Lifelink Other Demons you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink. Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Bloodstained Moon
card.text: Lands are mountains in addition to their other types.

card.name: Barbarian of the West
card.text: Trample, Haste Warriors you control have trample and haste. When Barbarian of the West enters, it deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Southern Fireblade
card.text: When Southern Fireblade enters, conjure a card named New Recruit into your hand. (They're 2/1 Human Warrior Allies that cost {W})

card.name: Nebula's Impulse
card.text: Exile the top X cards of your library, where X one plus is the number of cards named Nebula's Impulse in your graveyard. You may play them this turn. Conjure three duplicates of Nebula's Impulse and shuffle them into your deck.

card.name: Demonic Protector
card.text: If you would lose the game, instead exile Demonic Protector, each opponent loses 3 life, and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Intrepid Rootwalla

card.name: Chromatic Attunement
card.text: Lands you control are each basic land type in addition to their other types. When Chromatic Attunement enters, acquire two land cards. (Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal two land cards. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

card.name: Shifting Roots
card.text: You may play two additional lands each turn. Whenever you play a land, if it doesn't have a land type or it shares a land type with a land you control, sacrifice a land.

card.name: Forest Giant
card.text: Attune (Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control) {G}{G}{G}{G}|Trample. {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}|Other creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. {G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}{G}|Creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast. When Mountaineer Scout enters, you may destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Lost Forest Shrine
card.text: Attune (Add text based on basic land types among different lands you control) When Lost Forest Shrine enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {G}{G}{U}{U}|At the beginning of your end step, you gain 3 life. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Battle of the Tower
card.text: When Battle of the Tower enters, acquire an Ally card. (Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an Ally card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.) Whenever an Ally or Warrior enters under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sacred Emissary
card.text: Sacred Emissary gets +2/+2 and has first strike as long as you control an Angel. If you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a Angel card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Lost From the World
card.text: Return each nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Lost From the World.

card.name: Zirlir, Prodigious Decipherer
card.text: Whenever Zirlir, Prodigious Decipherer deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, draw a card. Artifact spells you cast have attune and "{U}{G}|When this enters, create a 1/1 colorless Servo creature token."

card.name: Profane Emissary
card.text: Profane Emissary gets +2/+2 and has lifelink as long as you control a Demon. If you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a Demon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Jklamdiel, Xirok's Chosen
card.text: Whenever a Demon enters under your control, target opponent loses life equal to its power. Whenever a Demon dies under your control, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

card.name: The Night Riders' Bane

card.name: Corrupted Forester
card.text: When Corrupted Forester enters or attacks, mill three cards. {B}{G}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Return a card that shares a type with that card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only once during each of your turns.

card.name: Unending Reinforcements

[-X]: Exile target creature with mana value X or less until Drorix leaves the battlefield.

card.name: In Search of Grandeur
card.text: Once each turn, when you cast a permanent spell, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with mana value 1 greater than the spell cast without paying its mana cost.
